game.name: Kontrakt
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 통계, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Kontrakt is a hyper-violent action-adventure game about schizophrenia with a dark and twisted story. You will assume the role of a hitman involved in mysterious contract killing, while uncovering the dirty truth and secrets behind the City of Light.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kontrakt is a hyper-violent action-adventure game about schizophrenia with a dark and twisted story. You will assume the role of a hitman involved in mysterious contract killing, while uncovering the dirty truth and secrets behind the City of Light.

reviewHighlights.text: haha, holy.. :) this is so much harder than hotline miami..! i died more than 60 times on second mission..lol so i say; dear dev, if there's any kind...
